name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior HubSpot Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience driving high-performance application development, focusing on CRM solutions and automation in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **SQL**, and integrating with **REST APIs**. Demonstrated expertise in workflow design, including custom object creation and deal pipeline management within **HubSpot** alongside automation solutions using tools like **Zapier** and **Workato**.

Strong problem-solving capabilities with a keen attention to detail, ensuring high-quality data entry and reporting through insightful dashboards. Adept at fostering collaboration and communication within cross-functional teams to achieve business objectives. Additionally, well-versed in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems utilizing AWS and Azure, which enhance overall system capabilities.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define requirements for new features and enhancements, leveraging strong communication and problem-solving skills to drive project success.
Developed reporting tools within **HubSpot** that enabled team members to track performance metrics and visualize data trends, resulting in improved decision-making capabilities.
Executed advanced SQL queries to analyze data from **HubSpot**, providing insights that guided strategic initiatives and operational improvements.
